member.name: SVUIA_STATUS
member.summary: Used with the method to set the state of a browser view.

member.name: SVUIA_STATUS.SVUIA_DEACTIVATE
member.summary: The browser view has been deactivated.

member.name: SVUIA_STATUS.SVUIA_ACTIVATE_NOFOCUS
member.summary: The browser view is activated and does not have focus.

member.name: SVUIA_STATUS.SVUIA_ACTIVATE_FOCUS
member.summary: The browser view is activated and has focus.

member.name: SVUIA_STATUS.SVUIA_INPLACEACTIVATE
member.summary: The browser view is activated in place.
